props.name: type
props.description: The type of the menu item, corresponds to the 'Type' property in Figma.

props.name: hasSubMenu
props.description: Whether the menu item has a nested sub-menu, corresponds to the 'has sub-menu' property in Figma.

props.name: status
props.description: The visual state of the menu item, corresponds to the 'Status' property in Figma.
